about_the_game:
Included in The Argonautica DLC


  • An immersive walk-through audio book, narrated by Betsy Brantley (English ~ 3.5 hrs).
  • Argonus and the Gods of Stone Original Soundtrack by composer Rich Douglas.
  • The Concept Art of Argonus by illustrator Nabetse Zitro (~ 20 pgs).

Availability

Game Launch: October 8, 2019. Be sure to follow Zojoi on Twitter and FB!

Included in The Argonautica DLC


  • An immersive walk-through audio book, narrated by Betsy Brantley (English ~ 3.5 hrs).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 450 or higher
  • Storage: 531 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIndows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel core i5, i7 or AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1080 or higher
  • Storage: 531 MB available space

short_description: The Argonautica Add On includes an immersive audio walk-through narrated by Betsy Brantley (The Princess Bride and Who Framed Roger Rabbit), the game’s original score by composer Rich Douglas and a compendium of the game’s concept with art from Nabetse Ziro.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
